company.title: Chibifire.com (Pronounced as chee-bee-fire)
company.description: Ernest (iFire) Lee is a Canadian developer specializing in game engine technology, with a focus on the Godot Engine. As a core contributor, he leads the development of Godot's glTF 3D import/export pipeline and collaborates with OMIGROUP to enhance metaverse interoperability, notably through the V-Sekai group's VRM avatar importer.

history.header: Godot Engine | Core 3D Pipeline Coordinator (Animation/Import Systems) | 2017–Present
